version_description:
Default language - en-IN
Set your difficulty level!
eSports Lobbies - Host tournaments, join for free, spectate!
Sri Lankan Premier League introduced in Career (On Completion / Restart of New Career)
Match Highlights with full camera control plus video & audio recording!
2x Faster Kit Unlocks for a month - free!
Challenge a Friend.
7 all-new Bowling Actions, new animations!
New in-game Cutscenes!
Kit drop after 1st game of the day, win or lose!
Improved Daily Claim!
Base difficulty eased, other bugfixes

- Exciting New English Commentary by Isa Guha; former England team player and international cricket commentator.
- Gethu New Tamil Commentary by popular commentator Abhinav Mukund; former India team opening batsman and former Tamil Nadu skipper.
- Commentary combo - Isa Guha & Mathew Hayden
- Gameplay and camera improvements
- Other bugfixes
